[E014] Error: missing type for readonly property `Foo\Bar\Baz::$name`
   ,-[code.php:7:27]
   |
 5 | final class Baz {
   *             ^^^  
   *                   
   * 
 7 |           public readonly $name,
   *                  ^^^^^^^  ^^|^^  
   *                             `---- try adding a type before `$name`
